feed.title: ToolJet Releases

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: CE-LTS-2.50.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

üõ†Ô∏è Fixes

  • Fix: Target and actions section getting overlap in TJDB foreign key drawer by @manishkushare in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9996
  • Fix: Salesforce plugin component by @parthy007 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9946

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/CE-LTS-2.50.2...CE-LTS-2.50.3

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: CE-LTS-2.50.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bugfixes: Table crash fixes for LTS / Zindex issue for datepicker by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9984
  • Perf: performance improvement by @arpitnath in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10004

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/CE-LTS-2.50.3...CE-LTS-2.50.4

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.60.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • hotfix : Datepicker popover coming behind other components in viewer mode by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9965

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.60.2...v2.60.3

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.60.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Hotfix: Salesforce plugin by @akshaysasidrn in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9910
  • Docker workflow changes by @adishM98 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10010
  • hotfix: Hidden component's box height not shrinking by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10003

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.60.3...v2.60.4

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.61.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Changes

üöÄ Features

  • Infinite scrolling with search for foreign key selection dropdown in #9785
  • closes: #9701, #9795
  • by: @ganesh8056

‚≠ê Improvements

  • Support for better keyboard shortcuts in #9791
  • closes: #9749, #9753, #9769, #9900
  • by: @shaurya-sharma064
  • Typeover null values in cell edit and row edit in #9739
  • closes: #9709
  • by: @shaurya-sharma064
  • Foreign key dropdown position is pinned on cell for edit in #9826
  • closes: #9748
  • by: @shaurya-sharma064
  • Removed unique constraint for boolean columns in edit/create drawers in #9804
  • closes: #9772
  • by: @shaurya-sharma064
  • Foreign key values for dropdown are cached initially in #9828
  • closes: #9745
  • by: @manishkushare
  • Standardised the drawer heading's styles in TJDB in #9747
  • closes: #9698
  • by: @parthy007
  • Disabled boolean datatype selection for foreign key on create and edit table in TJDB in #9817
  • closes: #9773
  • by: @parthy007
  • Updated the text in delete popup in TJDB in #9744
  • closes: #9719
  • by: @parthy007
  • Added read documentation links for foreign key on ToolJet database dashboard drawers in #9820
  • closes: #9696
  • by: @S-Abdul-Rahman

üõ†Ô∏è Fixes

  • Fix flickering effect upon opening and closing fk drawers in #9783
  • closes: #9694
  • by: @manishkushare
  • Fix sidebar flicker upon changing the current table in #9723
  • closes: #9693
  • by: @manishkushare
  • Fix inconsistent drawer open/close transitions on dashboard in #9710
  • closes: #9706
  • by: @parthy007
  • Fix adding both filter and sort for TJDB query is not working and it throws error in #9794
  • closes: #9609
  • by: @S-Abdul-Rahman
  • Fix TJDB icon for "Add relation" button when disabled in #9780
  • closes: #9699
  • by: @S-Abdul-Rahman
  • Fix tableName params for DynamoDB delete operation in #9972
  • closes: #9949
  • by: @amanregu
  • Fix for missing foreign key constraint on app import in #9661
  • closes: #9695
  • by: @shaurya-sharma064
  • Fix foreign-key dropdown width oversize issue in the create and edit row in #9766
  • closes: #9767
  • by: @S-Abdul-Rahman

New Contributors

  • @ruthvik129 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9668
  • @PriteshKiri made their first contribution in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9764
  • @shaurya-sharma064 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9760

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.60.4...v2.61.0
